entries.title: Amazon brings Matter to Echo devices, plugs, bulbs, and other devices you own
entries.description: This is the first phase of Amazon's Matter rollout.

entries.title: What does my perfect 2022 smartphone look like?
entries.description: From performance and camera hardware to the Android skin and beyond, here's what I want to see.

entries.title: Editing videos takes forever, Wondershare Filmora 12 sets creators free
entries.description: Wondershare Filmora 12 cuts down your time at the editing table, and even lets you take editing to the couch!

entries.title: Elon asked, you told him: He should step down from Twitter
entries.description: Almost 58% of respondents to Elon Musk's poll voted for him to step down.

entries.title: Your custom Android home screens really wowed us in 2022!
entries.description: We run the #aahomescreens event every week on Twitter, and here are our favorites this year.

entries.title: OnePlus announces the official launch date of the OnePlus 11
entries.description: The global launch event will be held in New Delhi, India.

entries.title: Facebook Marketplace: Your home for old furniture, DVDs, and a Pixel Tablet
entries.description: The listing follows a recent tradition of upcoming Pixel products landing on Facebook's storefront first.

entries.title: You told us: You think Samsung can deliver a Snapdragon beater
entries.description: A small majority think Samsung has what it takes to beat Qualcomm. Some of you aren't convinced, though.

entries.title: Some lucky US consumers will soon get their hands on Nothing Phone 1
entries.description: There's no word on a timeline just yet, but it'll presumably take place before the stable release in Q1.
